ovdesc.p: This working file contains formatted lines to be displayed in AM.GRID.MASTER and AM.GRID queries.
Each record corresponds to a grid line.

desc.p: Specifies the column number.
Multi-valued field associated with the ABC field in the file to give the co-ordinates for the data field defined in the COL field.
No input field automatically updated by the AM.GRID.FMT.BUILD routine whenever the comparison grid is re-built

Unique code which identifies the GRID.FMT record. It is keyed on five elements :
- the session number
the type of comparison (SAM for a portfolio, CMP for a consolidate one)
the customer security account for a portfolio or the AM.COMPARE id for a consolidate one
the matrix code
and
